verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Drinking at the springs
of living water,
Happy now am I,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
My soul they satisfy;
Drinking at the springs
of living water,
O wonderful
and bountiful supply.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I thirsted in the barren
land of sin and shame,
And nothing satisfying
there I found;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
But to the blessed cross of
Christ one day I came,
Where springs of living water
did abound.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
How sweet the living water
from the hills of God
It makes me glad
and happy all the way;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Now glory, grace and
blessing mark the path I’ve trod,
I’m shouting “Hallelujah”
ev’ry day.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
O sinner, won’t you come
today to Calvary,
A fountain there is flowing
deep and wide;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
The Saviour now invites you
too the water free,
Where thirsting spirits
can be satisfied.
